Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory139.png', 3: '0.2', 4: '0.2', 5: '0'}
{3: 'Time passes, and the sandstorm seems to gradually weaken.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Dammit... Where did he go...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis can see a dark shape about a few dozen meters ahead of him.'}
{3: 'Heading in that direction, Noctis is counting on the fact that a normal person would be seeking shelter in a place like that in this storm.'}
{3: 'That is, if said person is still alive.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "He can't be dumb enough to miss this shelter, can he—", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'As sand flies above his head, Noctis hears a clear gunshot right ahead of him.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'I was going to ask you!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Beardy?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "Yeah, it's me."}
{3: 'Noctis trudges forward knee-deep in the sand, his footsteps covered almost immediately after he takes a step.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory32.jpg'}

{1: '1', 3: 'Finally reaching the source of the voice, Noctis finds Beardy leaning against a rock, his right hand holding the gun with which he fired his warning shot. Beardy chuckles wryly at Noctis.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: '****ing hell. What were you thinking, chasing after some petty thieves in this storm? Were you trying to kill yourself?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Beardy struggles to stand up. Sand swoops down his body, revealing two more lifeless men lying on top of him.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'What happened?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'Two punks tried to take my stuff. I chased after them... and took care of them.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'Better... be ready for retaliation in their line of work, I suppose.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "You're freezing... Hey, your injury...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis realizes that Beardy is about to go into shock. His trousers and legs are dyed crimson red by blood and the yellow sand.'}
{3: 'The storm slowly quiets down, echoing how silently the blood flows into the sand.'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'I... dreamt about him earlier.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "We were in that park... and... he... This is all that's left...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Blood loss and hypothermia are taking his consciousness away.'}
{3: 'Although Noctis has no interest in medical knowledge, he has learned some first-aid techniques from fighting side-by-side with Vera over the years.'}
{3: 'Beardy squeezes out a smile. He tries to hand his projector and films to Noctis, but his arms are stiff, no longer under his command.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "I don't want your stuff. Hold it yourself.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "You're a grown man. Don't you die in this shithole like a coward.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Noctis tears down a piece of fabric from Beardy's trousers, wrapping and tying it around the gnarly wound on his thigh."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Hey! Keep your eyes on me! Don't fall asleep!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "I'm going to carry you back to Vera, okay? She'll fix you up!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Holding Beardy's head with one hand, Noctis gently slaps his face to keep him awake."}
{3: 'Noctis took part in many covert missions when he was in the Purifying Force. He has taken many lives himself.'}
{3: 'He has seen many "final moments" flickering in people\'s eyes. Some of them showed desperation, some fear, and some rage.'}
{3: 'For a second, Noctis also sees the "final moment" in Beardy\'s eyes.'}
{3: 'It is not desperation, fear, or anger, however. It is the relentless hope of life.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "That's right!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis looks around him. The storm has completely ceased.'}
{3: "He confirms Beardy's status one last time. Right as he is going to carry Beardy on his back, he notices a knife stuck in one of the dead bodies."}
{3: 'Noctis pulls the knife out without hesitation. Sand immediately covers where it was over the corpse.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "It's yours, right?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Beardy nods.'}
{3: "Noctis puts the knife in Beardy's stiffened hand and squeezes it tight, making sure Beardy is holding onto the knife, his film, and his projector."}
{3: 'The silhouettes of No. 21 and Vera become clearer and clearer under the night sky on the path Noctis came from.'}
{3: 'Only now does Noctis realize that the ravaging sandstorm has eased.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "Hey, Vera's here.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Noctis slaps Beardy's face again, albeit slightly harder than last time. He knows that a person is likely not going to wake up if they lose consciousness in this state."}
{3: 'Beardy no longer says anything, simply nodding.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Beardy and Noctis are here!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Captain, I smell blood...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'You owe me twice now.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera swiftly takes out the first aid kit and prepares to perform emergency treatment on Beardy.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Who did the bandage?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Not bad. Far from satisfactory, but it will do for now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'His wound is covered in sand... I have to disinfect it first. Get him something to bite down.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Beardy shakes his head, refusing Vera's suggestion."}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'The pain... keeps me awake.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Vera does not hesitate any longer and quickly disinfects the injuries, reduces the inflammation, and dresses his wound.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You're a lucky bastard. It didn't touch your femoral artery.", 4: '1'}
{3: "After a simple binding, Vera hangs a bag of artificial blood onto Beardy's body and watches the light yellow liquid slowly drip into him."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "That's all we can do for now. Rescuing and treating human patients wasn't part of our mission.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I guess it's still necessary to bring spare supplies with us...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'So... how did you two find us?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I smelled Beardy after the storm started to stop.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Standing next to Beardy, No. 21 watches him attentively.'}
{3: 'She gently removes a small needle-like object from his shirt. It is hardly noticeable unless one pays very close attention.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'A locator. You have one on you as well.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'What? Me? Where?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Since our mission takes place in a signal blind spot, Captain asked me to bring the locators.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'But they only go up to 3 km.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Why is his temperature and blood pressure still so low...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Noctis, get a fire going. His temperature is dropping too quickly. He's going to die from the cold before he bleeds out.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Tch... I used all the bombs when we were fighting...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Here. I brought you this.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Vera points at the old-school explosives hung on her banner spear.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'The man from the garage left it behind.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "This thing won't start a fire.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "This is black powder... It lights up for a second and goes out immediately. It won't work.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I thought you were good at this.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Yeah, that's why I know it won't do anything.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Dissonant voices suddenly appear nearby.'}
{3: 'Many strange-looking Corrupted crawl out from beneath the sand as if hiding from the sandstorm underground just now. As the storm abates, they rise once more.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Give me a break.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "It's not just them. There... are more around us.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: '...Should we retreat?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Hard to retreat with a wounded man.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "I guess we're doing it the hard way.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis instinctively reaches for the bombs around his waist, but he accidentally touches an unfamiliar bottle.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Whisky?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Oh, right. The tavern owner gave it to me.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Looking at the clear, strong alcohol in his hand, Noctis seems to recall something and turns around, crouching before Beardy.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hey. Are you scared of dying?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'I... owe Zack my life.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'Now... I owe you twice.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Zack? Who's Zack?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Beardy shakes his head, his eyes covered in tears.'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "I'm not afraid of death.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "But I'm going to live.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Pop! Noctis removes the cork from the bottle and hands it to Beardy.'}
{3: "Beardy's hand is still a little stiff from the cold and the blood loss, but he manages to take the bottle from Noctis and takes a sip before passing it back."}
{3: 'Noctis does not say anything else. He pats Beardy on his shoulder before turning around and grabbing the explosives next to Vera.'}
{3: "The wish in Beardy's eyes has been passed to Noctis."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "You know the drill. Let's blow them up.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Noctis ties the bomb and the whisky together, and he flings it toward the approaching Corrupted—', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1920.prefab', 3: '1', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1920.prefab', 3: '2', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1920.prefab', 3: '3', 4: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHuijinNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Alcohol and fire, iron and blood. They bring death, but they also ignite new hope.', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
